description:
Stop Tilting at Windmills--Spotting Bottlenecks

Presented by Yann Malet and Brandon Konkle

Learn the questions to ask and the tools to use to spot performance
problems in your application. We won't tell you how to scale your site,
but we will show you how to locate the bottlenecks as they pop up.
title: Stop Tilting at Windmills - Spotting Bottlenecks
